Color - Class in primitives
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Color(double, double, double) - Constructor for class primitives.Color
Constructor to generate a color according to RGB components Each component in range 0..255 (for printed white color) or more [for lights]

constructRaysThroughPixel(int, int, int, int) - Method in class elements.Camera
this function gets the view plane size and a selected pixel, and return the rays from the view plane which intersects the focal plane
constructRayThroughPixel(int, int, int, int) - Method in class elements.Camera
this function gets the view plane size and a selected pixel, and return the ray from the camera which intersects this pixel

crossProduct(Vector) - Method in class primitives.Vector
calculates and return the cross product of the current vector in a given vector the way is to create a vector: (y1z2-z1y2, z1x2-x1z2, x1y2-y1x2)
